Product Name: Mermaid / Trumpet Evening Gown Elegant Pleated Dress Formal Satin Wedding Floor Length Short Sleeve One Shoulder Slit Embroidery Appliques
Highlights: ['[Fabric]: Crafted from a luxurious satin fabric, this evening gown offers a smooth and shiny finish that exudes elegance and sophistication. The satin material combines with fine embroidery and appliques to bring a touch of glamour to the dress.', '[Fit]: The dress features a flattering mermaid/trumpet silhouette that hugs the body beautifully, highlighting the waistline before flowing into a floor-length skirt. A built-in bra provides added support and comfort for a seamless fit.', "[Design Highlights]: This gown showcases an elegant one-shoulder neckline that adds a modern twist to the classic evening dress. The slit detail offers a hint of allure, while the embroidery and appliques around the waist add intricate detailing that enhances the dress's formal appeal.", '[Occasions]: Perfect for formal events, weddings, or any special occasion where elegance is the focus. The striking dark green color makes it a standout choice for making an unforgettable impression.', '[Size Range]: Available in a wide range of sizes from US 0 to US 26W, this gown also offers custom measurements to ensure the perfect fit for every body type.']
